quotes.quote: Someone 'pulls strings'  to obtain employment for another within the same department, and the formerly unemployed person succeeds in getting his/her benefactor fired in order to take the benefactor's place.
Friends are like fiddle-strings, they must not be screwed too tight.
Hands...which projected like strings upon the finger-board of a violin, and armed with claws like those on the terminations of bats' wings.
Felt like marionette, as though something outside her were jerking the strings that forced her to scream and strike.
We're all drawn by wires by puppets, and the strongest wire pulls us in the direction in which we are meant to go.
Stopped laughing as suddenly as if a string had been broken.
Explicitness makes matters clear; it takes 300 strings to string 600; unless one explains it, no one understands.
One dog does not string decorative beads all around one's waist.
A person who is like the divining string: unless you throw him down, he will not talk sense.
You reveler do things in moderation; if the string of life is cut, there is no retrying it.
But bacon's not the only thing,/ That's cured by hanging from a string.
There are strings in the human heart that had better not be vibrated.
Or bid the soul of Orpheus sing / Such notes are warbled to the string / Drew iron tears down Pluto's cheek.
Evolution is nothing but a long string of false steps; and it may happened that a severed head will sing.
One  Christmas, things were so bad in our house that I asked Santa for a yo-yo and all I got was a piece of string. My father told me it was a yo.
It could be said of me that in this book I have only made up a bunch of other men's flowers, providing of my own only the string that ties them together.
The fibers of all things have their tension and are strained like the strings of an instrument.
The world is all gates, all opportunities, strings of tension waiting to be struck.
It's true; once you are a father, there's no turning back. Your heart strings as well as your purse strings are never again the same.
There is geometry in the humming of the strings, there is music in the spacing of the spheres.
Sitting makes us think of standing / Our current stance keeps on demanding / We wish to fly without the wings / Puppets move before pulling the strings.
As I stare at it,I can feel little invisible strings,silently tugging me toward it. I have to touch it. I have to wear it. It's the most beautiful thing I've ever seen.
If our lives are made up of a string of a thousand moments, at some of those moments we look a lot more spiritually evolved than at others.
Enthusiasm is everything. It must be taut and vibrating like a guitar string.
When you cut the strings holding us, you must have been wounded.
Recreate life's strings to weave your own path.
When you cut the strings holding us. You must have been wounded.
If a string has one end, it has another.
Two touch the string, The harp is dumb.
